guide.introduction: Please refer to the website: http://sunny-stone.webs.com, you'll find the performance curve charts of the heat exchanger, heat exchangers, air cooled heat exchangers with interior turbulators to justify the function definitely.
guide.introduction_rendered: Please refer to the website: http://sunny-stone.webs.com, you'll find the performance curve charts of the heat exchanger, heat exchangers, air cooled heat exchangers with interior turbulators to justify the function definitely.

lines.text: this is finished air cooled heat exchanger (air to oil cooler).
lines.text_raw: this is finished air cooled heat exchanger (air to oil cooler).

lines.text: PLS see our aluminum core that is cooler mainbody before assembly.
lines.text_raw: PLS see our aluminum core that is cooler mainbody before assembly.

lines.text: Here are the exterior wavy air fins (the front 2 pcs) , and turbulator(the first pc in the back) for installed in oil chambers.
lines.text_raw: Here are the exterior wavy air fins (the front 2 pcs) , and turbulator(the first pc in the back) for installed in oil chambers.

lines.text: assembly of cooling fan with fan cowl.
lines.text_raw: assembly of cooling fan with fan cowl.

guide.summary: Heat Exchanger, Heat Exchangers, Air Cooled heat exchagners made from Aluminum extrusions with turbulators inside oil chambers to create interior detoured oil flow resulting in time increase while the oil staying in chambers, so increase heat transfer.
guide.title: Heat Exchanger, Heat Exchangers, Air Cooled Heat Exchangers Built with Taiwan Technology
